title: Pompeo on Ukraine Corruption, Coronavirus Update
itunes:title: Pompeo on Ukraine Corruption, Coronavirus Update
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli has been traveling with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and spoke to him in an exclusive interview from Jamaica about Iran-backed Hezbollah finding a foothold in South America. Ryan Kelley, Portfolio Manager at Hennessy Funds, discusses investing in gas and energy. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Dana Hull talk about Elon Musk's drastic steps to silence Tesla short sellers. Bloomberg News Health Reporter Michelle Cortez provides an update on the coronavirus spreading to the U.S. And we Drive to the Close with Oliver Pursche, Chief Market Strategist at Bruderman Asset Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
